item.title: ::Pickup
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Use ::pickup ##### ##### ");
        }
    }[/code]

Have fun.

Read full topic

item.title: ::Pickup
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 1)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such god damn item."); } } else { sendMessage("Fuck you, type it right, your pissing me off... :D"); } }
